title: Geistbusters 10/7: Lakers, New Zealand, Trump Meltdown, VP Debate
itunes:title: Geistbusters 10/7: Lakers, New Zealand, Trump Meltdown, VP Debate
description:
On this edition of Geistbusters Jack and Miles discuss the Lakers winning to make the series 3-1 in the Finals against the Heat. American's are enamored by New Zealand's handling of COVID-19, Trump is melting down on Twitter, and tonight is the VP Debate!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
